Bash(docker-compose exec backend python3 -c "
from app import create_app, db
from app.models import Team
from app.services.draft_analyzer import DraftAnalyzer

app = create_app()
with app.app_context():
    team = Team.query.get(''05b3e36b-a651-4da7-b7be-0eadc441dfb3'')
    if team:
        analyzer = DraftAnalyzer()
        result = analyzer.analyze_team_draft_patterns(team, days=90)
        
        print(f''\n=== Draft Analysis for {team.name} ===\n'')
        
        # Objective Control
        obj = result[''objective_control'']
        print(''Objective Control:'')
        print(f""  Baron: {obj[''baron''][''total_kills'']} total ({obj[''baron''][''avg_per_game'']} avg/game, {obj[''baron''][''first_baron_rate'']}% first)"")
        print(f""  Dragon: {obj[''dragon''][''total_kills'']} total ({obj[''dragon''][''avg_per_game'']} avg/game, {obj[''dragon''][''first_dragon_rate'']}% first)"")
        print(f""  Herald: {obj[''herald''][''total_kills'']} total ({obj[''herald''][''avg_per_game'']} avg/game, {obj[''herald''][''first_herald_rate'']}% first)"")
        
        # Bans
        print(f''\nFavorite Bans:'')
        print(f""  Phase 1 (First 3 bans):"")
        for ban in result[''favorite_bans''][''phase_1''][:5]:
            print(f""    Champion {ban[''champion_id'']}: {ban[''count'']} times"")
        
        print(f""  Phase 2 (Last 2 bans):"")
        for ban in result[''favorite_bans''][''phase_2''][:5]:
            print(f""    Champion {ban[''champion_id'']}: {ban[''count'']} times"")
    else:
        print(''Team not found'')
")
